mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_CD, SYS_COD, DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DIV_TYPE = '70' AND DIV_ID = '20'

SELECT LEVEL1_CD, LEVEL2_CD, LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '130' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '170' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '200' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '310' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '150' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '190' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '340' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '320' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '330' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '331' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '272' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '270' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '171' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '25A' ORDER BY LEVEL1_CD ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN (D.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL) THEN D.PJT_CD WHEN (D.PJT_CD IS NULL) THEN (C.PJT_CD + C.PJT_TYPE) END PJT_CD, C.PJT_NM FROM (SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_TYPE, A.SVC AS PJT_NM FROM T_PS1000 A UNION SELECT B.PJT_CD, B.PJT_TYPE, B.PJT_NM FROM T_PS3000 B WHERE B.PJT_CD <> '') C LEFT JOIN T_P11000 D ON C.PJT_CD = D.PJT_CD

SELECT CUST_CD, CUST_NM FROM T_AC0300 WHERE
CUST_CD LIKE '%'+#{CUST_CD}+'%'
CUST_NM LIKE '%'+#{CUST_NM}+'%'

SELECT DEPT_CD, SYS_COD, DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DIV_TYPE = '70'
AND DEPT_CD LIKE '%' + #{DEPT_CD} + '%'
AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%' + #{DEPT_NM} + '%'

SELECT B.SHORT_NM DEPT_NM, A.EMP_NO, A.KOR_NM, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'H' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.JIKGUP_CD) JIKGUP_NM, CONVERT(varchar(30), A.AUDIT_TM,112) AUDIT_TM, A.OUT_DT, (CASE WHEN A.OUT_DT ='' THEN '재직자' WHEN A.OUT_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '퇴직자' END) OUT_DT_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM T_HM1000 UNION SELECT* FROM T_HM1000_T) A, T_SC1010 B WHERE A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND EMP_NO LIKE '%'+#{EMP_NO}+'%' AND KOR_NM LIKE '%'+#{KOR_NM}+'%' AND (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'H' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.JIKGUP_CD) LIKE '%'+#{JIKGUP_NM}+'%' AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_NM}+'%' AND (CASE WHEN A.OUT_DT ='' THEN '재직자' WHEN A.OUT_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '퇴직자' END) LIKE '%'+#{OUT_DT_NM}+'%' ORDER BY EMP_NO

SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_NM, B.DEPT_CD, A.PJT_TYPE, (SELECT SHORT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, B.PM_EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = B.PM_EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = B.PM_EMP_NO) PM_EMP_NM FROM T_SM3000 A, T_PS1000 B WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_CD}+'%' ORDER BY A.PJT_CD DESC

SELECT PRE_PJT_CD, PJT_CD, PJT_TYPE, SVC AS PJT_NM, CUST_CD, CUST_NM, AREA_P, AREA_M, YAREA_P, YAREA_M, EST_AMT, BIZ_GBN, REGION, ZONE1, ZONE2, ZONE3, ZIP_CD, ADDR, BUILD_TYPE, DEPT_CD, INFO_EMP_NO, EMP_NO, PM_EMP_NO, ACT_STAT, PRODUCT, CRT_MAN, CRT_DATE, UPD_MAN, UPD_DATE, FORECAST_AMT, MARKET_MAN, UP_SU, DOWN_SU, COVERAGE, CAPACITY, PRINT_YN, PRINT_CNT, H_CNT, BIZ_TYPE, END_GBN FROM T_PS1000 WHERE ACT_STAT != '5' AND END_GBN = '' AND PJT_CD LIKE #{YEAR}+'%' AND PRE_PJT_CD LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' AND DEPT_CD LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_CD}+'%'

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT B.PJT_CD, A.PJT_NM, B.CONTRACT_DATE, B.DEPT_CD, CASE WHEN B.PJT_YEA_YN = 'T' THEN '4' /* 승인 */ WHEN B.PJT_E_GBN > '' AND B.PJT_E_DATE > '' THEN '5' /* 종료 */ WHEN C.MD>0 AND D.PN>0 THEN '3' /* 예산 or 미승인*/ ELSE '2' /* 계약 */ END RESULT_X FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000 B, (SELECT PJT_CD, COUNT(*) MD FROM T_P11050 GROUP BY PJT_CD) C, (SELECT PJT_CD, COUNT(*) PN FROM T_P11080 GROUP BY PJT_CD) D WHERE B.PJT_CD = A.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_CD *= C.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_CD *= D.PJT_CD) A WHERE A.RESULT_X LIKE '%'+#{RESULT_X}+'%' AND CONTRACT_DATE LIKE #{YEAR}+'%' AND PJT_CD LIKE '%'+${PJT_CD}+'%' AND DEPT_CD LIKE '%'+${DEPT_CD}+'%'

SELECT A.PJT_CD, (SELECT SVC FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}) PJT_NM, A.CRT_DATE, A.CONTRACT_DATE, A.CONTRACT_PRI1, A.CONTRACT_PRI2, A.CONTRACT_PRI3, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '170' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.CONTRACT_PRI3) CONTRACT_PRI3_NM, A.DEPT_CD, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, A.G_AREA_M, A.G_AREA_P, A.G_YAREA_M, A.G_YAREA_P, PYUNG_DAN, A.BUILD_TYPE, A.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, A.PJT_CONTRACT_AMT, A.CHANGE_AMT, A.BALANCE_AMT, A.SURTAX, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '340' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.SURTAX) SURTAX_NM, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '08' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.BUILD_TYPE) BUILD_NM, A.DONG_SU, A.HOUSE_SU, A.B_UP_SU, A.B_DOWN_SU, A.BUILD_STRUCT, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '310' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.BUILD_STRUCT) BUILD_STRUCT_NM, A.ZIP_CD, A.PJT_ADDR, A.REGION, A.REGION2, A.ZONE1, A.ZONE2, A.SCOPE1, A.SCOPE2, (SELECT BIZ_GBN FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}) BIZ_GBN, A.BUILD_GB, A.PM_EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = A.PM_EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = A.PM_EMP_NO) PM_EMP_NO_NM, A.EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) EMP_NO_NM, A.MARKET_MAN, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = A.MARKET_MAN UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = A.MARKET_MAN) MARKET_MAN_NM, A.INFO_EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = A.INFO_EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = A.INFO_EMP_NO) INFO_EMP_NO_NM, A.PJT_E_GBN, A.PJT_E_DATE, A.BREAK_AMT, A.PJT_NIC FROM T_P11000 AS A WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}

SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.CUST_CD, C.CUST_NM, B.LEVEL2_NM AS CUST_GBN_NM, N_RATE, (SELECT SUM(N_RATE) FROM T_P11010 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}) N_RATE_SUM, A.CONTRACT_AMT, (SELECT SUM(CONTRACT_AMT) FROM T_P11010 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}) CONTRACT_AMT_SUM FROM T_P11010 A, (SELECT LEVEL2_CD, LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '200') B, (SELECT CUST_CD, CUST_NM FROM T_AC0300) C WHERE A.CUST_GBN = B.LEVEL2_CD AND A.CUST_CD = C.CUST_CD AND A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}

SELECT PJT_CD, RM_SEQ, RM_STEP, B.LEVEL2_NM RM_STEP_NM, SALE_STEP, C.LEVEL2_NM SALE_STEP_NM, RM_AMT, SUGUM_RATE, (SELECT SUM(SUGUM_RATE) FROM T_P11030 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}) SUGUM_RATE_SUM, SALE_PLAN_DAY, (SELECT SUM(RM_AMT) FROM T_P11030 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}) RM_AMT_SUM FROM T_P11030 A, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM,LEVEL2_CD FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '150') B, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM,LEVEL2_CD FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110') C WHERE B.LEVEL2_CD = A.RM_STEP AND c.LEVEL2_CD = A.SALE_STEP AND PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} ORDER BY RM_SEQ ASC
SELECT PJT_CD, SUGUB, SU_RATE FROM T_P11040 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}
SELECT PJT_CD, MAX(PJT_SEQ) AS PJT_SEQ FROM T_P11000_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} GROUP BY PJT_CD

SELECT PJT_CD, PJT_TYPE, SVC, CUST_CD, CUST_GBN, CUST_NM, AREA_P, AREA_M, YAREA_P, YAREA_M, EST_AMT, BIZ_GBN, REGION, REGION2, REGION3, ZONE1, ZONE2, ZONE3, SCOPE1, SCOPE2, SCOPE3, ZIP_CD, ADDR, BUILD_TYPE, DEPT_CD, INFO_EMP_NO, EMP_NO, PM_EMP_NO, CD_REG_DATE, END_DATE, END_GBN, END_BIGO1, PRODUCT, CRT_MAN, CRT_DATE, UPD_MAN, UPD_DATE, FORECAST_AMT, MARKET_MAN, DESIGN_MAN, UP_SU, DOWN_SU, COVERAGE, CAPACITY, CLASS_GBN, BUILD_GB, PRINT_YN, PRINT_CNT, BIZ_TYPE FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_P11010( PJT_CD, CUST_CD, CUST_GBN, N_RATE, CONTRACT_AMT ) VALUES( #{PJT_CD}, #{CUST_CD}, #{CUST_GBN}, #{N_RATE}, #{CONTRACT_AMT} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.PJT_CD, B.PJT_NM, A.DEPT_CD, A.PM_EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = A.PM_EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = A.PM_EMP_NO) AS PM_EMP_NM FROM T_P11000_H A, T_SM3000 B WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND A.PJT_SEQ > 0 AND A.DEPT_CD LIKE '%'+#{DEPT_CD}+'%' AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' AND A.PJT_DATE LIKE #{YEAR}+'%' ORDER BY A.PJT_CD ASC
SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_DATE, A.PJT_SEQ, B.LEVEL2_NM FROM T_P11000_H A, T_SC9100 B WHERE A.PJT_GB = B.LEVEL2_CD AND A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND B.LEVEL1_CD = '430' ORDER BY A.PJT_DATE ASC

SELECT A.PJT_CD, B.PJT_NM, A.DEPT_CD, A.PM_EMP_NO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = A.PM_EMP_NO UNION SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000_T WHERE EMP_NO = A.PM_EMP_NO) AS PM_EMP_NM, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM, A.PJT_DATE, A.PJT_GB, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE LEVEL1_CD = '430' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.PJT_GB) LEVEL2_NM, A.CHANGE_SAYU, A.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, A.PJT_CONTRACT_AMT, A.G_AREA_P, A.G_AREA_M, A.G_YAREA_P, A.G_YAREA_M FROM T_P11000_H A, T_SM3000 B WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND A.PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ} AND A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} ORDER BY A.PJT_CD ASC
SELECT PJT_CD, PJT_CONTRACT_AMT, TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, G_AREA_P, G_AREA_M, G_YAREA_P, G_YAREA_M FROM T_P11000_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT B.CUST_CD, (SELECT CUST_NM FROM T_AC0300 WHERE CUST_CD = B.CUST_CD) AS CUST_NM, B.PJT_SEQ, B.CONTRACT_AMT, B.N_RATE, C.CONTRACT_AMT_SUM, C.N_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11010 A, T_P11010_H B, (SELECT SUM(CONTRACT_AMT) AS CONTRACT_AMT_SUM, SUM(N_RATE) AS N_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11010_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ_BEFORE}) C WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND B.PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ_BEFORE}

SELECT DISTINCT B.CUST_CD, (SELECT CUST_NM FROM T_AC0300 WHERE CUST_CD = B.CUST_CD) AS CUST_NM, B.PJT_SEQ, B.CONTRACT_AMT, B.N_RATE, C.CONTRACT_AMT_SUM, C.N_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11010 A, T_P11010_H B, (SELECT SUM(CONTRACT_AMT) AS CONTRACT_AMT_SUM, SUM(N_RATE) AS N_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11010_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ}) C WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND B.PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ}

SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_SEQ, A.RM_SEQ, A.RM_STEP, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '150' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.RM_STEP) RM_STEP_NM, A.SALE_STEP, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.SALE_STEP) SALE_STEP_NM, A.RM_AMT, A.SUGUM_RATE, A.RM_SEQ OLD_RM_SEQ, B.RM_AMT_SUM_BEFORE, B.SUGUM_RATE_SUM_BEFORE, C.RM_AMT_SUM_AFTER, C.SUGUM_RATE_SUM_AFTER FROM T_P11030_H A, (SELECT SUM(RM_AMT) AS RM_AMT_SUM_BEFORE, SUM(SUGUM_RATE) AS SUGUM_RATE_SUM_BEFORE FROM T_P11030_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ_BEFORE}) AS B, (SELECT SUM(RM_AMT) AS RM_AMT_SUM_AFTER, SUM(SUGUM_RATE) AS SUGUM_RATE_SUM_AFTER FROM T_P11030_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ}) AS C WHERE A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND A.PJT_SEQ BETWEEN #{PJT_SEQ_BEFORE} AND #{PJT_SEQ} ORDER BY PJT_SEQ ASC, RM_SEQ ASC

SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_SEQ, A.RM_SEQ, A.RM_STEP, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '150' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.RM_STEP) RM_STEP_NM, A.SALE_STEP, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.SALE_STEP) SALE_STEP_NM, A.RM_AMT, A.SUGUM_RATE, A.RM_SEQ OLD_RM_SEQ, B.RM_AMT_SUM, B.SUGUM_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11030_H A, (SELECT SUM(RM_AMT) AS RM_AMT_SUM, SUM(SUGUM_RATE) AS SUGUM_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11030_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ_BEFORE}) AS B WHERE A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND A.PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ_BEFORE}

SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_SEQ, A.RM_SEQ, A.RM_STEP, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '150' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.RM_STEP) RM_STEP_NM, A.SALE_STEP, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.SALE_STEP) SALE_STEP_NM, A.RM_AMT, A.SUGUM_RATE, A.RM_SEQ OLD_RM_SEQ, B.RM_AMT_SUM, B.SUGUM_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11030_H A, (SELECT SUM(RM_AMT) AS RM_AMT_SUM, SUM(SUGUM_RATE) AS SUGUM_RATE_SUM FROM T_P11030_H WHERE PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ}) AS B WHERE A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} AND A.PJT_SEQ = #{PJT_SEQ}
SELECT LEVEL1_CD, LEVEL2_CD, LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '25A' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '170' OR BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '210';

SELECT * FROM sf_p12_0850m_sl1( #{DEPT_CD}, #{CONTRACT_GBN}, #{PJT_E_GBN}, #{CUST_CD}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_START}, #{TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_END}, #{PYUNG_DAN_START}, #{PYUNG_DAN_END}, #{G_YEARA_P_START}, #{G_YEARA_P_END}, #{BUILD_TYPE}, #{ZIP_CD} ) ORDER BY PJT_CD

SELECT C.WORK_YY, C.WORK_MM, SUM(C.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, SUM(C.PJT_CNT) TOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.WORK_YY, SUBSTRING(A.WORK_YY,5,2) WORK_MM, A.PJT_CNT, A.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT FROM (SELECT SUBSTRING(PJT_DATE,1,6) WORK_YY, COUNT(*) PJT_CNT, ISNULL(SUM(TOT_CONTRACT_AMT),0) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT FROM T_P11000_H A, DBO.SF_SC1010 ('03','','','') B WHERE A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND A.PJT_SEQ = 0 AND A.PJT_DATE LIKE (REPLACE(#{YEAR},' ','') + '' + '%') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(PJT_DATE,1,6) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(PJT_DATE,1,6) WORK_YY, COUNT(*) PJT_CNT, ISNULL(SUM(CHA_AMT),0) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT FROM T_P11000_H A, DBO.SF_SC1010 ('03','','','') B WHERE A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND A.PJT_SEQ > 0 AND A.PJT_DATE LIKE (REPLACE(#{YEAR},' ','') + '' + '%') AND A.PJT_GB NOT IN ('02') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(PJT_DATE,1,6) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTRING(PJT_DATE,1,6) WORK_YY, COUNT(*) PJT_CNT, ISNULL(SUM(CHA_AMT),0) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT FROM T_P11000_H A, DBO.SF_SC1010 ('03','','','') B WHERE A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND A.PJT_SEQ > 0 AND A.PJT_DATE LIKE (REPLACE(#{YEAR},' ','') + '' + '%') AND A.PJT_GB = '02' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(PJT_DATE,1,6) ) A ) C GROUP BY WORK_YY, WORK_MM

SELECT B.DEPT_CD, (SELECT D.DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 D WHERE D.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, B.PJT_CD, A.PJT_NM, B.PJT_DATE, B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, C.COUNT_VALUE, C.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_SUM FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000_H B, (SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_VALUE, SUM(B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_SUM FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000_H B WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_DATE LIKE #{YEAR_MONTH}+'%') C WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_DATE LIKE #{YEAR_MONTH}+'%' ORDER BY B.DEPT_CD

SELECT C.DEPT_CD_SUB, COUNT(C.DEPT_CD_SUB) DEPT_CD_COUNT, SUM(B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_SUB FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000 B, (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(DEPT_CD,1,2) DEPT_CD_SUB, DEPT_CD FROM T_SC1010 GROUP BY DEPT_CD) C WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND B.CONTRACT_DATE BETWEEN #{YEAR}+'0101' AND #{YEAR}+'1231' GROUP BY C.DEPT_CD_SUB

SELECT B.DEPT_CD, (SELECT D.DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 D WHERE D.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, B.PJT_CD, A.PJT_NM, B.PJT_DATE, B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT, C.COUNT_VALUE, C.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_SUM FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000_H B, (SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_VALUE, SUM(B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT) TOT_CONTRACT_AMT_SUM FROM T_SM3000 A, T_P11000_H B WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_DATE BETWEEN #{YEAR}+'0101' AND #{YEAR}+'1231' AND DEPT_CD LIKE #{DEPT_CD_SUB}+'%') C WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND B.PJT_DATE BETWEEN #{YEAR}+'0101' AND #{YEAR}+'1231' AND DEPT_CD LIKE #{DEPT_CD_SUB}+'%' ORDER BY B.DEPT_CD
